# Task #140 - Pre-populate Common Technology Synonyms - Completion Report
**Status**: COMPLETE
**Generated By**: Test-and-Cleanup Agent (combined workflow)
**Date**: 2025-12-23

## Executive Summary
Implemented an idempotent seed script to pre-populate common technology synonyms on deployment. The script creates 23 synonym groups (exceeding the 12 minimum requirement) covering common technology abbreviations like BLE/Bluetooth Low Energy, Wi-Fi/WiFi, IoT/Internet of Things, etc.

## Implementation Details

### Synonym Groups Implemented (23 total)
1. BLE / Bluetooth Low Energy / Bluetooth LE
2. Wi-Fi / WiFi / Wireless LAN / WLAN
3. IoT / Internet of Things
4. ML / Machine Learning
5. AI / Artificial Intelligence
6. NFC / Near Field Communication
7. GPS / Global Positioning System
8. USB / Universal Serial Bus
9. API / Application Programming Interface
10. SDK / Software Development Kit
11. UI / User Interface
12. UX / User Experience
13. UWB / Ultra-Wideband
14. LTE / Long Term Evolution
15. 5G / Fifth Generation
16. PCB / Printed Circuit Board
17. OTA / Over-the-Air
18. RTOS / Real-Time Operating System
19. MCU / Microcontroller Unit
20. SoC / System on Chip
21. UART / Universal Asynchronous Receiver-Transmitter
22. SPI / Serial Peripheral Interface
23. I2C / Inter-Integrated Circuit

### Key Features
- **Idempotent**: Uses TagSynonymService.add_synonym() which returns None for existing relationships
- **Creates missing tags**: Automatically creates tags if they don't exist in the database
- **Logs results**: Provides structured logging of tags created, synonyms created, and synonyms skipped
- **Follows existing pattern**: Consistent with seed_tags.py script structure
